system.description:
At 8th level, choose one benefit from the following:

Boon of Fury

Your weapon attacks deal extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier. In addition, you can infuse divine power into a weapon attack to deal an extra 1d8 damage, the type of which is the same as you deal with Channel Divinity: Elemental Intervention. Once you have used this feature a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier, you can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

Furious Spellcraft

Damage you deal with Cleric cantrips increases by your Wisdom modifier. You also learn a bonus cantrip chosen from your elemental school (from any class’s spell list).
